IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION IS AN INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF NONPROFIT, SCIENTIFIC AND PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATIONS (BEING NATIONAL, MULTINATIONAL OR INTERNATIONAL IN SCOPE) CONCERNED WITH PATTERN RECOGNITION, COMPUTER VISION, AND IMAGE PROCESSING IN A BROAD SENSE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION IS AN INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF NONPROFIT, SCIENTIFIC AND PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATIONS (BEING NATIONAL, MULTINATIONAL OR INTERNATIONAL IN SCOPE) CONCERNED WITH PATTERN RECOGNITION, COMPUTER VISION, AND IMAGE PROCESSING IN A BROAD SENSE.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION CONDUCTS A BIENNIAL INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON PATTERN RECOGNITION WHICH ATTRACTS SCIENTISTS, RESEARCHERS AND PRACTITIONERS IN THE FIELD FROM VARIOUS COUNTRIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE F, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ORGANIZATION HAS COMMITTEES THAT ADMINISTER THE VARIOUS AWARDS WHICH INCLUDE PERIODIC REPORTS.

THE ORGANIZATION IS AN INTERNATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF NONPROFIT, SCIENTIFIC AND PROFESSIONAL ORGANIZATIONS (BEING NATIONAL, MULTINATIONAL OR INTERNATIONAL IN SCOPE) CONCERNED WITH PATTERN RECOGNITION, COMPUTER VISION, AND IMAGE PROCESSING IN A BROAD SENSE.
FORM 990 IS EMAILED TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW.
ALL COMPENSATION IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. ALL OFFICERS ARE VOLUNTEERS WITH NO SALARY.

GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
